description: Lists all OpenSearch applications under your account.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filters the list of OpenSearch applications by status. Possible values: CREATING, UPDATING, DELETING, FAILED, ACTIVE, and DELETED. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ApplicationSummaries
nested_items.description: Summarizes OpenSearch applications, including ID, ARN, name, endpoint, status, creation time, and last update time.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of an OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of an OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint URL of an OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of an OpenSearch application. Possible values: CREATING, UPDATING, DELETING, FAILED, ACTIVE, and DELETED.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when an OpenSearch application was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last update to an OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Send the request again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.
